full_summary:
=====================================

### 2024 Grounds Maintenance Services at CFB Trenton

#### Tender Details

| Title | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Reference | WS4261267062-Doc4330187979 |
| Tender Amendment Number | 3 |
| Tender Solicitation Number | WS4261267062 |

#### Key Dates

* **Publication Date**: December 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 12, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: January 8, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2028

#### Tender Status

The tender has **expired**.

#### Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit a request for proposal for **Facility Maintenance and Repair Services** for the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton location.

#### Services Scope

The tender includes the provision of grounds maintenance services at CFB Trenton.

#### Trade Agreements

The tender is governed by the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Crystal Denton (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: <crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* **Phone**: Not available
* **Fax**: Not available

#### Tender URL

To access the tender, visit the following URL: 
<https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18206506> 
Note: The URL is subject to change and may require logging in.

#### Notes

* **Language of Tender**: English and French
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quinte West
